get_page_count[source]

get_page_count(filepath:PathLike[Any])

add_comma_separation(input:int)

get_stats[source]

get_stats(source_path:PathLike[Any])

Displays statistics on the PDF data contained in a particular repository.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
source = Path("/Users/strickvl/Desktop/NL")

get_stats(source)
